title: Shiny App Example
text:
This section will describe the example in the repo’s examples folder.
The app is posted on shinyapps.io: https://jimurick.shinyapps.io/HospitalStarRatings/

title: Shiny App Example
text:
Files

app.R - the main Shiny app file (see App below)
util.R - contains 1 function that is used a few times in app.R
www

hospital_df.Rda - an R data file that contains the hospital_df dataframe, with one row per hospital, including columns for latitude/longitude and the HTML in the marker popups.
util.js - a javascript file with one function that’s called when you click the “View Data” button on a hospital’s popup
about.css - a CSS file that changes the style of a table in the About tab, and also changes the color of monospaced code font from purple (the default) to black.

About.qmd - I render this to the markdown file About.md with the RStudio Terminal command quarto render examples/shiny/About.qmd -t md. Then include the markdown in the last tab of app.R.

title: Shiny App Example
text:
Dependency: R Package hospitalstars
This shiny app uses an R package I hospitalstars
It may be interesting because

Most data manipulation is done with the package data.table, because it’s much faster than dplyr.
There is a C++ implementation of the k-means clustering algorithm. It was taken from the amap package (here) and modified to add a parameter from the SAS implementation (FASTCLUS).

title: Vermont State Notes
text:
The notes here are for 3 examples:

A Quarto notebook

Notebook file: vermont/examples/quarto/quarto_example.qmd
including math with mathjax
plots, some of which are interactive
organizing notes into a website with github pages

A Shiny app

App posted to shinyapps.io: https://jimurick.shinyapps.io/HospitalStarRatings/
Main R script here: vermont/examples/shiny/app.R
Depends on my R package hospitalstars

This Quarto website

Configuration is in the main vertmont repo folder
Other pages are under the folder vermont/notes

title: Quarto Website Example
text:
This section will describe the example in the main repo folder and the notes folder.
Quarto websites

title: Quarto Website Example
text:
Files
The main project folder includes these files:

_quarto.yml - configuration file (see section below)
.gitignore - file used by git
.Rprofile
index.qmd
README.qmd
jim.ico - I wrote my name with MS Paint, and converted the png file to ico
scipts/

util.R includes variables and functions I want to be available everywhere in the project.
style.scss is a SASS file used by this website
util.js
latex.js includes some javascript code that’s the mathjax analog of \(\LaTeX\) def/newcommand type commands (see the mathjax docs)

title: Quarto Website Example
text:
Rendering
quarto render
quarto render README.qmd -t md
